xwikidoc.name: RatingsTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
admin.ratings=Ratings
rating.rate=Rate! rating.saveexception=Error when saving the rating. rating.votenotvalid=You cannot vote with 0 value. rating.voteoutofbounds=The vote is out of the scale limit. rating.setvote.inprogress=Your vote is being saved... rating.setvote.success=Your vote has been saved! rating.setvote.error=Error when saving your vote. XWiki.Ratings.RatingsConfigurationClass_enabled=Enable Ratings XWiki.Ratings.RatingsConfigurationClass_enabled.hint=Enabling ratings allows users to vote on pages and display the average votes. Disabling them doesn't remove the existing vote, it just hides the interface.
#@deprecatedstart
## until 12.9RC1 admin.ratings.activateratings=Activate the ratings on this wiki admin.ratings.activateratingsinfo=Activating the ratings on this wiki will display a visual average rating (composed of stars) at the top right corner of each document of this wiki (except the ones in the *XWiki* space). Authenticated users will be able to rate documents by clicking on the stars. An alternative to this is to use the *Ratings Panel*, for example to only enable ratings in the desired spaces. To use the Ratings Panel, please visit the *Panel Wizard* administration section. admin.ratings.resetratings=Reset all the ratings on this wiki. This will make all documents start over with no vote. Be aware that this operation is irreversible, besides on a document-per-document rollback basis. Resetting all ratings can take a while if the wiki has a large amount of documents already rated. admin.ratings.uninstallratings=Uninstalling the ratings application will delete the documents that compose the application, but *all votes on rated document will be preserved*. If you reinstall the application later on, the documents will start over with the saved average rating they had before uninstalling the application. Finally, uninstalling the ratings application will *remove the ratings category* from the wiki administration. admin.ratings.ratingsactivated=Ratings have been activated admin.ratings.ratingsdeactivated=Ratings have been deactivated admin.ratings.illegalrequest=Illegal request
rating.yourvote=Your vote rating.logintorate=Login to rate rating.novotes=No votes yet
## Used to indicate where deprecated keys end #@deprecatedend
